hero_description: Our goal is to sustainably promote cooperation between Albanian and German lawyers, deepen mutual understanding of the respective legal systems, and create a platform for professional exchange, legal education, and international networking.
title: Become a member and shape the future
story: Through our work, we aim to make a positive contribution to an even closer legal and cultural connection between Albania, Kosovo, other Albanian-speaking regions, and Germany, while promoting the interdisciplinary exchange of ideas and solutions in legal scholarship. Join our network and help shape the future of Albanian-German legal cooperation!
title1: Promoting legal cooperation between Albania and Germany
story1: TThe German-Albanian Lawyersâ€™ Association e.V., based in Frankfurt am Main, was established to promote legal cooperation and represent the interests of Albanian, Kosovar, and German lawyers, as well as lawyers from other Albanian-speaking regions. Our association serves as a platform for lawyers who seek to support the exchange of knowledge, experience, and best practices in legal and societal matters.
what_we_do_title: Legal Capacity Building and Professional Networking
1_content: We regularly organize lectures and discussion events that enable our members to address current legal topics and exchange ideas with experts.
2_content: A central component of our work is the publication of contributions by our members on legal topics from the Albanian, Kosovar, and German legal spheres, as well as on cross-border issues. These publications aim to address current developments, stimulate legal discourse, and contribute to the further development of a transnational understanding of law.
3_content: Our seminars offer targeted further training opportunities, while we also hold regular meetings such as the annual conference or the specialist group day to intensify the exchange of ideas between members.
4_content: Furthermore, we have a Student Division and a Department for Young Professionals to address the specific needs of these groups.
